oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 2011: Looking at a partially submerged Mud Island behind news trucks.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: 2011 flood; Mississippi River; water; news; Riverside Drive;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: News vans are parked on a part of Riverside that has not been flooded yet. Mud Island is seen in the background.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sphar, Roger
